message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $10,000 by both parties. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. If you decide to purchase this product, you can enjoy it at a special introductory price of $9,500. This offer is valid for a limited time only, so I encourage you to make your decision soon. Should you have any questions or require further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.
